sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		Inv_LinkFlag as string,
		Dashboard as string,
		CargoId as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		DealerCode as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		Brand as string,
		ModelLine as string,
		RailHead as string,
		Truck_key as string,
		RAIL_HEAD_NUMBER as string,
		RailHeadDescription as string,
		RailHeadCodeDescription as string,
		VPC_CODE as string,
		VPC as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		Customer as string,
		Plant as string,
		OrderType as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		WholesaleDate as string,
		CURINV_VPC as string,
		Status as string,
		LOC_TYPE as string,
		ETA_DATE as string,
		Upfit as string,
		CustomerSold as string,
		CARRIER as string,
		CARRIERTYPE as string,
		DESTINATION as string,
		TenderDate as string,
		LCDate as string,
		ReceivedDate as string,
		FLEET_BEGIN_DATE as string,
		MARKET as string,
		Profile as string,
		FLEET_END_DATE as string,
		Wholesaled as string,

		OG_STATUS as string,

		RegionDetailsCode as string,
		DeliveryRegionCode as string,
		OrderAssignmentDate as string,
		MASTER_DEALER_CODE as string,
		LC as string,
		PlantName as string,
		YardExitDate as string,
		DeliveryDate as string,
		OrderNumber as string,
		ModelCode as string,
		TrimCode as string,
		ColorCode as string,
		DLRASSIGN_LOC as string,
		DropShipFlag as string,
		ReturnedFlag as string,
		CustomerSoldFlag as string,
		POE as string,
		SubOrderType as string,
		SerializationDate as string,
		FinalOKDate as string,
		AssignedFlag as string,
		RegionCode as string,
		DropShipState as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		Address as string,
		ADDRESS1 as string,
		Name as string,
		City as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		DISTRICT_CODE as string,
		DISTRICT_NAME as string,
		SALES_DISTRICT as string,
		CustomerNumber as string,
		DealerAddress as string,
		DealerCity as string,
		DealerState as string,
		DealerZipCode as string,
		DealerCountryCode as string,
		DealerCountryName as string,
		RouteCode as string,
		CURINV_PLANT as string,
		NMCReceiptDate as string,
		DealerName as string,
		OrderAssignedLocation as string,
		ModelYear as string,
		ModelDescription as string,
		ModelGroup as string,
		Inv_LinkFlag as string,
		Dashboard as string,
		CargoId as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		DealerCode as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		Brand as string,
		ModelLine as string,
		RailHead as string,
		Truck_key as string,
		RAIL_HEAD_NUMBER as string,
		RailHeadDescription as string,
		RailHeadCodeDescription as string,
		VPC_CODE as string,
		VPC as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		Customer as string,
		Plant as string,
		OrderType as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		WholesaleDate as string,
		CURINV_VPC as string,
		Status as string,
		LOC_TYPE as string,
		ETA_DATE as string,
		Upfit as string,
		CustomerSold as string,
		CARRIER as string,
		CARRIERTYPE as string,
		DESTINATION as string,
		TenderDate as string,
		LCDate as string,
		ReceivedDate as string,
		FLEET_BEGIN_DATE as string,
		MARKET as string,
		Profile as string,
		FLEET_END_DATE as string,
		Wholesaled as string,
		SCHEDULE_OFFLINE_DATE as string,
		VesselName as string,
		State as string,
		OG_STATUS as string,
		REGION_SHORT_NAME as string,
		REGION_NAME as string,
		RegionDetailsCode as string,
		DeliveryRegionCode as string,
		OrderAssignmentDate as string,
		MASTER_DEALER_CODE as string,
		LC as string,
		PlantName as string,
		YardExitDate as string,
		DeliveryDate as string,
		OrderNumber as string,
		ModelCode as string,
		TrimCode as string,
		ColorCode as string,
		DLRASSIGN_LOC as string,
		DropShipFlag as string,
		ReturnedFlag as string,
		CustomerSoldFlag as string,
		POE as string,
		SubOrderType as string,
		SerializationDate as string,
		FinalOKDate as string,
		AssignedFlag as string,
		RegionCode as string,
		DropShipState as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		Address as string,
		ADDRESS1 as string,
		Name as string,
		City as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		DISTRICT_CODE as string,
		DISTRICT_NAME as string,
		SALES_DISTRICT as string,
		CustomerNumber as string,
		DealerAddress as string,
		DealerCity as string,
		DealerState as string,
		DealerZipCode as string,
		DealerCountryCode as string,
		DealerCountryName as string,
		RouteCode as string,
		CURINV_PLANT as string,
		NMCReceiptDate as string,
		DealerName as string,
		OrderAssignedLocation as string,
		ModelYear as string,
		ModelDescription as string,
		ModelGroup as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		Inv_LinkFlag,
		Dashboard,
		CargoId,
		CUST_ID,
		Org_ID,
		DealerCode,
		VPC_ID,
		Brand,
		ModelLine,
		RailHead,
		Truck_key,
		RAIL_HEAD_NUMBER,
		RailHeadDescription,
		RailHeadCodeDescription,
		VPC_CODE,
		VPC,
		LOCATION_ID,
		Customer,
		Plant,
		OrderType,
		StatusCode,
		ShipDate,
		WholesaleDate,
		CURINV_VPC,
		Status,
		LOC_TYPE,
		ETA_DATE,
		Upfit,
		CustomerSold,
		CARRIER,
		CARRIERTYPE,
		DESTINATION,
		TenderDate,
		LCDate,
		ReceivedDate,
		FLEET_BEGIN_DATE,
		MARKET,
		Profile,
		FLEET_END_DATE,
		Wholesaled,
		SCHEDULE_OFFLINE_DATE,
		VesselName,
		State,
		OG_STATUS,
		REGION_SHORT_NAME,
		REGION_NAME,
		RegionDetailsCode,
		DeliveryRegionCode,
		OrderAssignmentDate,
		MASTER_DEALER_CODE,
		LC,
		PlantName,
		YardExitDate,
		DeliveryDate,
		OrderNumber,
		ModelCode,
		TrimCode,
		ColorCode,
		DLRASSIGN_LOC,
		DropShipFlag,
		ReturnedFlag,
		CustomerSoldFlag,
		POE,
		SubOrderType,
		SerializationDate,
		FinalOKDate,
		AssignedFlag,
		RegionCode,
		DropShipState,
		CountryCode,
		Address,
		ADDRESS1,
		Name,
		City,
		ZipCode,
		DISTRICT_CODE,
		DISTRICT_NAME,
		SALES_DISTRICT,
		CustomerNumber,
		DealerAddress,
		DealerCity,
		DealerState,
		DealerZipCode,
		DealerCountryCode,
		DealerCountryName,
		RouteCode,
		CURINV_PLANT,
		NMCReceiptDate,
		DealerName,
		OrderAssignedLocation,
		ModelYear,
		ModelDescription,
		ModelGroup
	)) ~> ADONETDestination
